DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare renal toxicity Iodixanol Iopromide patient renal dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Renal Toxicity Iodixanol Iopromide Patients With Renal Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: The study design compare renal toxicity Iodixanol Iopromide coronary angiography percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) patient Chronic Kidney Disease , consider original renal function adequate hydration . The risk vary degree renal impairment , change serum Cys C level also evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Provides write Informed Consent willing comply protocol requirement Is referred cardiac angiography , without PCI Has document predose serum creatinine level 1.5～3.5 mg/dl men 1.3～3.0 mg/dl woman Serum creatinine level twice test conform baseline criterion , difference twice serum creatinine test 30 % ( first test : within 3 month , prior enrollment ; second test : enrollment ) Has history hypersensitivity iodinecontaining compound Has endstage renal disease Has kidney transplantation Has creatinine clearance rate > 60 ml/min last 3 month Has acute coronary syndrome heart failure ( class II accordance Killip class III accordance classification New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) ) shock Patients cancer Has diabetes serious complication , kidney organ Patients serious blood system disease Heart failure [ class III~Ⅳ accordance classification New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) ( ) pulmonary edema ] Patients hepatic insufficiency [ 3 time ALT ( ) AST normal reference value limit ] Has receive iodinate contrast agent within 14 day prior administration study agent Is schedule receive iodinate contrast agent within 7 day administration study agent Has acute renal failure endstage renal disease require dialysis past 3 month Use 3 day continuously nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug within 1 week procedure Patients hypotension [ ( SBP < 80 mmHg 1h needing Medication intraaortic balloon counterpulsation ( IABP ) ] Uncontrolled condition hyperthyroidism pregnancy lactation Is plan receive drug without permission protocol Participating another intervention research study last 3 month legally incapacitated limitation Any condition suitable enrollment
